author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Wednesday
description: U.S. stock futures point to a gain for the Dow at Wednesday's open after blue chips gave up an over 900-point surge in the prior session.
content:
1. Dow set to rise after Tuesday's 900-point surge fizzled
A woman walks by the Wall Street subway station sign on March 23, 2020 in New York City.
U.S. stock futures were pointing to an over 200-point gain for the Dow Jones Industrial Average at Wednesday'… [+2530 chars]
